description:
Conan and his friends search for the culprit who made the false bomb threat to the bank and caused a panic that injured multiple people. The next morning, Otsubo`s body is discovered. Mitsuhiko reasons that he realized Kagura was the culprit, so Kagura killed him to silence him. Conan and his friends go directly to Kagura, but they`re unable to find any conclusive evidence. As they proceed with their investigation, Conan and his friends begin to suspect a love triangle between three best friends Kagura, Kochiyama, and Haruka. Conan closes in on the truth behind the bomb scare and Otsubo`s murder, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Prix à payer pour des likes (2e partie)
いいね. の代償 (後編)
